title: Consolidate Multiple Orders into One Shipment
description: A logistics planner has multiple orders going to the same customer and wants to consolidate them into a single, larger shipment to save on freight costs.

tasks.description: Find all 'Ready to Ship' orders for a specific customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a list of three separate orders for the same customer.

tasks.description: Create a new 'consolidated shipment' and link the individual orders to it.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates a master shipment and associates the three orders.

tasks.description: Arrange transportation for the single, larger consolidated shipment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent books one truck for the consolidated shipment instead of three separate ones.
